page.title: 07EDUCATION (Continued)
page.content: {Sele School Staff. There are eight teachers in our school this year.Their names are Mrs Jackson, Mrs Spry,Mr Stobbart,Mrs,McAllister Mrs Richards,Mr Smeaton,Mrs Nichol, and Mrs Gamble.Our headmistress is Mrs Story.Mrs McAllister has been here the longest,that is for 14 years. {Punishments The punishments we are given are these.We have to go out in the corridor or stand in front of the classroom.We sometimes have to sing solos as well. {Sele School Outdoors. In the playground we have a garden which the teachers and some of the children look after.In the garden we grow flowers such as Lobelia, Geranium, Cowslip, Pansy and Bluebell. The trees are copper beech and ash trees.
